name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in building and managing high-performance solutions in cloud environments, specializing in **Microsoft Azure**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Azure DevOps**, **ArgoCD**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible**. Possessing a robust understanding of CI/CD pipelines, I excel in automating deployment processes and enhancing system reliability, utilizing tools such as **Grafana** and **Prometheus** for monitoring and performance optimization. 

I have hands-on experience in scripting with **PowerShell** and **Bash**, ensuring security and compliance aligned with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My strong problem-solving skills enhance collaboration across teams, ensuring seamless integration of best practices in networking and security. Additionally, my background as a Full Stack Developer with **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and experience in AI/ML integrations, complements my DevOps expertise by fostering a holistic approach to development and operational excellence.
